tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE biometric_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, fingerprint VARCHAR(255), timestamp TIMESTAMP)},{
CREATE TABLE user_info (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10))
CREATE TABLE UserBiometrics (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), fingerprint BYTEA, face_scan BYTEA)
CREATE TABLE HeartRateData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, rate INT, time TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE BloodPressureData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, systolic_pressure INT, diastolic_pressure INT, date DATE)
CREATE TABLE TemperatureData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, temperature FLOAT, location VARCHAR(50), date DATE)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(50), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), height DECIMAL(5,2), weight DECIMAL(5,2))
CREATE TABLE fingerprints (fingerprint_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), fingerprint_data BYTEA, timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ)
CREATE TABLE iris_scans (iris_scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), iris_data BYTEA, timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ)
CREATE TABLE heart_rate (heart_rate_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), heart_rate INT, timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ)
CREATE TABLE face_recognition (face_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id), face_data BYTEA, timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ)
